## kl list apps

list all the apps available in selected project

### Synopsis

```
List all the apps available in project.
Examples:
	# list all the apps with selected project
  kl list apps

	# list all the apps with projectId
  kl list apps <projectId>
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for apps
  -h, --help   help for apps
```
